Description.Djim: Djim were the spirits of priests and looked like ancient [[human]]s wearing religious robes.
Description.Djangkong: Djangkong resembled human skeletons with transparent bones.
Description.Gendruwo: Gendruwo were mischievous spirits and were able to shape-shift.
Description.Panaspati: Panaspati resembled humans but instead their heads were between their legs.
Description.Setan gundul: Setan gundul appeared as small human children with topknots.
Description.Uwil: Uwil were the spirits of deceased [[sohei]].
Description.Wedon: Wedon appeared as humans covered completely in white sheets made from silk.
